Beautiful shoe, we purchased for navy blue suit. Did find it to run big by a whole size so measure your foot and follow the size guidelines. We did and repurchased ( had to get through Zappos - Amazon sale had ended) them, because they are just that beautiful of a man’s dressshoe.

title: Cole Haan mens Hawthorne Plain Oxford
product-description: Cole Haan mens Hawthorne Plain Oxford

Reviews.content: Really good quality and they look awesome.

Beautiful shoe, we purchased for navy blue suit. Did find it to run big by a whole size so measure your foot and follow the size guidelines. We did and repurchased ( had to get through Zappos - Amazon sale had ended) them, because they are just that beautiful of a man’s dressshoe.
They look really good and fit well. The shoes are also very comfortable.

Order a full size down. These run extremely large. I’ve given up after two returns, as the sizing is not consistent with the size guide measurements. Take a careful look at the size guide lengths and tape measure the inside and outside of your normal-sized dress shoes to compare and find a size that makes sense. Style of the shoe looks nice and great silhouette for formal events. They raised prices by about $20 for other sizes between returns so choosing a different brand to buy from.

One shoe doesn't even have a finish on the leather! It's like Cole Haan completely missed a spot when adding the leather dye for the British tan and the darker finish on the ends of the toes. Either these are complete fakes, or Cole Haan's quality control is nonexistent. Additionally, I ordered a certain size, and while the box says the correct size ordered, the shoes themselves are one full size over what I ordered (size is too big and size inside shoes are one full size too big). Given all of this, I'm assuming these are fakes. Sending back.

title: Avenger Work Boots Men's Low Top Industrial Shoe
product-description: The board inspired Blade Series comes with uncompromised value. These Blades are a casual lifestyle safety shoe that provide you an all-day safety protection, comfort and durability. The Blade series originates with an Aluminum protective toe with an oil and slip resistant lightweight EVA midsole and Rubber outsole for provide best in class slip rating of Mark II .58. Don’t be fooled by the cool look, these shoes are tough, stylish and comfortable. Wear them all day with no need to remove for a night out.
